title: Hot Blooded Youth
overview: A legendary story about a young man who overcomes many hardships to become a formidable force in the Shanghai bund.Wu Qian grew up in the streets. With nothing to his name, he works a thankless job just to make a living. Nonetheless, he is quick-witted, talented and exceptionally gifted in steam-powered machinery. By chance, he gets pulled into a complicated fight and works his way to become a champion.
